h1: How Many Calories in Cinema Popcorn?
assumptions: Standard small movie theater serving (approx. 100g or 11 cups popped), oil-popped with butter topping and salt; values based on average chain data.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by theater chain, serving size, butter amount, and preparation; check venue info or labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A small serving of cinema popcorn typically contains about 400 kcal, mostly from fat due to oil and butter.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a small popcorn cinema serving?
faqs.a: About 400 kcal for a standard buttered small serving.

faqs.q: Is cinema popcorn high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 650 mg per small serving due to added salt.

faqs.q: How does butter affect calories in popcorn cinema?
faqs.a: Butter adds ~150 kcal per small serving; plain is lower at ~250 kcal.

faqs.q: What are the macros for cinema popcorn?
faqs.a: Per small serving: 45 g carbs, 24 g fat, 6 g protein, 8 g fiber.

faqs.q: How many calories in cinema popcorn without oil?
faqs.a: Air-popped version has ~100 kcal per similar volume, much lower than oil-popped.
